pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Aggressive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() From Fossil Only.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Throws targets in the air.$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 1 $(item)Big Hammer$(), Chance between 1 $(item)Diamond Helmet$(), $(item)Diamond Chestplate$(), $(item)Diamond Leggings$() or $(item)Diamond Boots$(), Chance between 1 $(item)Tiger's Eye Helmet$(), $(item)Tiger's Eye Chestplate$(), $(item)Tiger's Eye Leggings$() or $(item)Tiger's Eye Boots$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Red Mushrooms$() or 1-4 $(item)Brown Mushrooms$(), 1-2 chances between a $(item)Diamond$(), a $(item)Emerald$(), a $(item)Tiger's Eye$(), a $(item)Amethyst$() or a $(item)Ruby$().

pages.title: Description
pages.text: The Hercules Beetle is a malformed beetle that has been mutated into a giant creature by an unknown force or substance. A Hercules Beetle used to be a peaceful creature, but something has changed over time, as well as making their heart able to store and create armors and weapons.
